snippet: Their goal is nothing less than making the electric car a viable alternative for millions of consumers and, in the process, helping shore up their own flattening business of supplying electricity.
abstract: Wheels column; big electric utilities nationwide are expanding into electric vehicle charging stations; they seek to shore up their flattening business and increase use of electric cars for millions of people; Energy Department says there are 9,000 public stations with 22,900 chargers nationwide.
lead_paragraph: Their goal is nothing less than making the electric car a viable alternative for millions of consumers and, in the process, helping shore up their own flattening business of supplying electricity.

headline.print_headline: Utilities Push Into Fuel Stations for Electric Cars
headline.main: Utilities Push Into Fuel Stations for Electric Cars
